title: Starlight Scramble Renai Kouhosei
synopsis: In the near future, during the colony war, a girl was save by a little boy when a space station was attacked by terrorists in which the girl lost her parents.
staff: [['Komura, Toshiaki', ['Episode Director']], ['Hattori, Noritomo', ['Animation Director']], ['Koyama, Masahiro', ['Character Design']]]
